1370: Aghete was born in Appel Marckt in 1370.
Got married to Niels at age 23 in 1370.
Gave birth to Aghete in 1370 at age 23.
1374: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1374 at age 27.
1376: Gave birth to Eltetus in 1376 at age 29.
1377: Gave birth to Lenildis in 1377 at age 30.
1384: Gave birth to Eingeliadis in 1384 at age 37.
1385: Gave birth to Robbrecht in 1385 at age 38.
Lost daughter Eingeliadis when Eingeliadis was 2 years old.
Lost son Robbrecht when Robbrecht was 1 years old.
